text:
this update is a MASSIVE opportunity...

pretty much all businesses on SAP Business One need custom automations but can't afford the $50k-$200k custom dev agency costs

now with n8n + SAP nodes... you can build the same automations for 10x less...

SAP is everywhere in mid-size to enterprise companies, but customizing it is insanely expensive

most businesses just deal with manual processes because they can't justify the cost

now you can:
> pull data from SAP
> trigger workflows based on SAP events
> push updates back to SAP
> connect SAP to their other tools

all of that without touching their core setup

if you're running an automation agency... this is your entry to enterprise clients: businesses on SAP have real budgets, they're already spending big on their ERP and ofc they'll pay for automations that save time

here's the play:
1. learn n8n SAP nodes
2. identify common SAP pain points
3. build demo workflows
4. target SAP Business One companies
5. position as "SAP automation specialist"

go get your bag
